about.description: Aspiring software engineer with a strong passion for software development, deep learning, and MLOps. Eager to leverage expertise in software development to build scalable, data-driven solutions. Committed to driving innovation by integrating cutting-edge AI techniques with robust engineering practices, ensuring seamless deployment and operational efficiency of machine learning models.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Working on various aspects in the field of software development for the Cytomine software. Cytomine is a web platform for collaborative analysis of very large bio-medical images and semi-automatic processing of large image collections using machine learning algorithms.

projects.title: bathienle.github.io
projects.description: Personal website to showcase my projects and skills.
